original_text: And it shall be, that the city which is next unto the slain man, even the elders of that city shall take an heifer, which hath not been wrought with, and which hath not drawn in the yoke;
korean_text: 그 피살된 곳에서 제일 가까운 성읍의 장로들이 그 성읍에서 아직 부리지 아니하고 멍에를 메지 아니한 암송아지를 취하여

sentences.original_text: that the city which is next unto the slain man
even the elders of that city
which hath not been wrought with
and which hath not drawn in the yoke
